name: Dante's Detour - Chapter I
description:
Get ready to explore! Delve into the mysterious world of Dante's Detour.

Follow a young dinosaur on his way to find a fallen star. You control Dante as he stumbles into a network of caves deep beneath his usual napping spot.

Dante's Detour is an adventure platformer with many hazards and pitfalls. You have no choice but to descend into the unknown to find out just where the star went...

Explore a fantastical world of environments and characters that guide you on your journey of curiosity!

Game is currently still in development.

Chapter 1 is a proof of concept/early access game. Any donations made will go towards improvements to this and future titles.

Approximate playtime: 2-3 hours

Game features: Save Function, Map, Music Player

  • Game developed in GB Studio
  • Art assets created in Aseprite
  • Music made in OpenMPT

Controls

UpWDownSLeftARightDRun, Interact
JJump, Cancel
KStartEnter
Select (unused)
L Shift
